body:
I always see this whenever I use ``spack -vd install [package]``

```/global/u2/m/mamelara/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc: line 358: /global/u2/m/mamelara/spack-cc-libelf@0.8.13%gcc@6.1.0 arch=cray-CNL-ivybridge /x2yjrjr.in.log: No such file or directory```
title: / before hash in spec causing No Such File Or Directory Error for debug log
